author: Staff Reporter
text:
V.M. Muthukumar (second from right), Vice-Chancellor, Bharathidasan University, felicitating bronze medal-winning weightlifter P. Prabakaran in Tiruchi.

P. Prabakaran, representing Bharathidasan University, won bronze medal in the all-India inter-university weightlifting championship held in Guntur recently.

Prabakaran, a student of Annai Vailankanni Arts and Science College, Thanjavur, competed in the 69 kg category and finished third with a total lift of 266 kg (110 kg in snatch and 156 kg in clean and jerk).

V.M. Muthukumar, Vice-Chancellor, Bharathidasan University, felicitated the youngster in the presence of A. Palanisamy, Associate Professor and Sports Secretary, Bharathidasan University, D. Murugaraj, Director of Physical Education, AVVM Sri Pushpam College, and N.S. Sivakumar, Director of Physical Education, Urumu Dhanalakshmi College.
title: Weightlifting championship
